body_html:
FWIW I just saw something similar while training an LSTM through keras; of 8 runs of the same model w/ different hyperparameters, 7 completed and one stopped after a few hours with:

*** Error in `python': invalid
 fastbin entry (free): 0x00007fa6eec0f830 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib64/libc.so.6(+0x7d023)[0x7fa84b5af023]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZN10tensorflow6Tensor16CopyFromInternalERKS0_RKNS_11TensorShapeE+0xe6)[0x7fa8356c17d6]

+0x1701e9e)[0x7fa835595e9e]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
+0x16f7460)[0x7fa83558b460]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZN5Eigen26NonBlockingThreadPoolTemplIN10tensorflow6thread16EigenEnvironmentEE10WorkerLoopEj+0x388)[0
x7fa835795428]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZNSt17_Function_handlerIFvvEZN10tensorflow6thread16EigenEnvironment12CreateThreadESt8functionIS0_EEU
lvE_E9_M_invokeERKSt9_Any_data+0x22)[0x7fa835795082]
/lib64/libstdc++.so.6(+0xb5220)[0x7fa8337cd220]
/lib64/libpthread.so.0(+0x7dc5)[0x7fa84c20bdc5]
/lib64/libc.so.6(clone+0x6d)[0x7fa84b62828d]
======= Memory map: ========
00400000-00401000 r-xp 00000000 00:32 518803                             /home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/
deep/bin/python3.5
00601000-00602000 rw-p 00001000 00:32 518803                             /home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/
deep/bin/python3.5

body:
FWIW I just saw something similar while training an LSTM through `keras`; of 8 runs of the same model w/ different hyperparameters, 7 completed and one stopped after a few hours with:

```
*** Error in `python': invalid
 fastbin entry (free): 0x00007fa6eec0f830 ***
======= Backtrace: =========
/lib64/libc.so.6(+0x7d023)[0x7fa84b5af023]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZN10tensorflow6Tensor16CopyFromInternalERKS0_RKNS_11TensorShapeE+0xe6)[0x7fa8356c17d6]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
+0x1701e9e)[0x7fa835595e9e]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
+0x16f7460)[0x7fa83558b460]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZN5Eigen26NonBlockingThreadPoolTemplIN10tensorflow6thread16EigenEnvironmentEE10WorkerLoopEj+0x388)[0
x7fa835795428]
/home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/deep/lib/python3.5/site-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so(
_ZNSt17_Function_handlerIFvvEZN10tensorflow6thread16EigenEnvironment12CreateThreadESt8functionIS0_EEU
lvE_E9_M_invokeERKSt9_Any_data+0x22)[0x7fa835795082]
/lib64/libstdc++.so.6(+0xb5220)[0x7fa8337cd220]
/lib64/libpthread.so.0(+0x7dc5)[0x7fa84c20bdc5]
/lib64/libc.so.6(clone+0x6d)[0x7fa84b62828d]
======= Memory map: ========
00400000-00401000 r-xp 00000000 00:32 518803                             /home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/
deep/bin/python3.5
00601000-00602000 rw-p 00001000 00:32 518803                             /home/bnaul/miniconda3/envs/
deep/bin/python3.5
0204f000-4eddd000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0                                  [heap]
7fa630000000-7fa63015f000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0
7fa63015f000-7fa634000000 ---p 00000000 00:00 0
7fa638000000-7fa6387f6000 rw-p 00000000 00:00 0
...
```
